ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( $Profile.Name = "Sales", $Profile.Name = "Pre Sales" ), OR( ISCHANGED(Call_ID__c), ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISCHANGED(Call_From__c), ISCHANGED(Call_To__c), ISCHANGED(Parent_ID__c), ISCHANGED(Call_Type__c), ISCHANGED(Start_Time__c), ISCHANGED(End_Time__c), ISCHANGED(Lead__c), ISCHANGED(Recording_File__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to edit these fields. Please contact Admin if changes are required.
